summary: Simple mod that adds a forge and workbench to Ivarstead
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][size=3]Changelog[/size][/b][/u]
[b]0.1[/b] (2/7/12) - Initial release


[u][size=3][b]Description[/b][/size][/u]
This simple mod adds a forge and workbench to the wood mill of Ivarstead. There shouldn\'t be any bugs besides some minor clipping (like the log behind the forge). Please report any other bugs that you discover though :)


[u][size=3][b]Installation[/b][/size][/u]
Automatic-
Download with NMM and activate

Manual-
Extract esp into the Data folder and activate


[u][size=3][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/u]
Should be compatible with anything that doesn\'t change this particular area of Ivarstead. Should also be compatible with all standalone weapon/armor crafting mods that use the standard forge/workbench. Load order shouldn\'t be an issue.
author: zenkmander
